ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectRosa Amorim Remission Order
PrecisINDIVIDUAL REMISSION ORDER remits tax in the amount of $2,839.00, a penalty of $1,422.85 and all arrears interest, paid or payable under Part I of the Income Tax Act by ROSA AMORIM for the 1991 taxation year.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2009-0069 Publication Date: 2009-08-19
